page.title: 01Annan & Newbie, SW Scotland
page.content: The town of{Annan}has a population of about 80000 and stands close to where the{River Annan}flows into the {Solway Firth.}On the opposite bank of the River Annan is{Newbie,}a small {industrial community}set in the heart of{good farmland. There is evidence of settlement in the area as far back as{Roman times, and the modern town of Annan is now a centre for local government administration, education, shopping, livestock markets, commerce and industry. The town stands on the main {A75 trunk road}and has a small{railway station. Its{low-lying situation}provides the area with a comparatively{mild {climate.
